Our policies, like Medicare for All, advance prosperity for working people.

I will #SayTheirNames. I will fight to end this epidemic. I will celebrate and uplift the voices of the many transgender people who are persisting and succeeding in spite of injustice. And I'll fight to ensure that every LGBTQ+ person has the opportunity to thrive.

Taiwan’s National Day, also known as Double 10 Day, is a time to commemorate those who stand up for freedom and against Chinese Communist oppression. Think of the alternative to these power outages and intense wildfires if America tackles climate change. 

We can build a smart, safe, and modern electrical grid that gives every American access to clean, cheap, and reliable energy from renewables. https://www.latimes.com/california/story/2019-10-10/millions-without-power-pge-blackouts-california

We need answers immediately.

In addition to abusing and manipulating our diplomatic relationships for Trump's political gain, we can add corruption and campaign finance violations to the list. https://www.thedailybeast.com/giulianis-ukraine-henchmen-lev-parnas-and-igor-fruman-arrested-on-campaign-finance-charge

Yesterday I continued my Indo-Pacific friends & allies tour in Taiwan, where I had the honor & privilege to meet with Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen. We're the richest country on Earth!

It's because they refuse to stand up to their billionaire donors, who hoard wealth and stash it in tax havens.

Almost half of all Americans will experience a mental illness during their lifetime. We have to take care of one another. In the wealthiest nation in the world, all of us, regardless of income, should have access to mental health care as a right. #WorldMentalHealthDay

Imagine living in a world in which not just entertainers & athletes but non-public figures can be fired by employer or kicked out of sporting event by a team, here in America, for condemning the actions of the govt of #China 

No need to imagine it. It’s already happening.

I believe decent housing, good health care, and a quality education are human rights that everyone should have. 

Under our ruthless economic system, they are commodities whose costs keep rising as Americans’ wages stagnate. 

This is why we fight. https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2019/10/03/your-money/middle-class-income.html

That role must go deeper than defeating Trump.

As president, here's my plan for LGBTQ+ Americans:

✅Establish a Chief Advocate for LGBTQ+ Affairs in the White House
✅Sign the Equality Act into law
✅Reverse the ban on trans service members
✅Make PrEP affordable and accessible

Tonight I was asked whether I’d commit to removing restrictions that prevent members of the LGBTQ community from donating blood.

My answer: “Two words—absolutely yes.” #EqualityTownHall #PowerOfOurPride

Like all people, LGBTQ+ Americans deserve safe, affordable housing. I'll increase the supply of affordable housing and strengthen protections against discrimination. And, as president, I'll develop a comprehensive LGBTQ+ youth homelessness prevention program.

Senator Rubio's message to #Northwest #Florida on the one year anniversary of #HurricaneMichael's devastating landfall: 

"We’re working hard, have worked hard, and will continue to work hard so that Northwest Florida is back and stronger than ever." http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1182308045780635648/img/qzb_aVoCvw36ZR_1.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1182308045780635648/vid/320x320/9fdsJ5tdY5oddMCx.mp4?tag=13

I’ll also push for landmark new anti-discrimination legislation to protect workers from harassment. And I am open to decriminalizing sex work. Sex workers, like all workers, deserve autonomy and are particularly vulnerable to physical and financial abuse.

I have long believed that democracy isn't just voting every four years—it’s about ordinary people creating community, engaging in the political process together, and building powerful grassroots movements to achieve progressive change. And that’s exactly what we’re doing. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGhY8MfXkAAKeg2.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1182291017351012352/vid/320x320/H9tRC2aDoMWz2oay.mp4?tag=13

LGBTQ+ activists and organizers have made enormous strides toward equality—but that hard-won progress is already under attack. We need a president who is ready to fight back. I've got a plan to secure LGBTQ+ rights and equality. http://ewar.ren/lgbtq-equality

At least 19 trans people have been killed just this year—almost all of whom were Black trans women. I will create a new grant program within the Office of Violence Against Women to channel resources to organizations by and for trans people to end this crisis.

Chairwoman @NitaLowey is a master legislator whose values-based leadership has touched countless lives in New York and around the world. While we will miss her deeply, we look forward to benefiting from her leadership in the months to come. https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/101019 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGiiZPOWwAAFrql.jpg

We need a president who will #SayTheirNames and fight to end this epidemic. We must ensure that trans women of color—and all LGBTQ+ people—aren't just safe from violence and discrimination, but also have every opportunity to thrive and succeed.

As we fight the climate crisis, justice for communities on the front lines must be at the core of our response to climate change—and I’ve got a plan for that. 
https://www.dataforprogress.org/blog/2019/10/9/elizabeth-warrens-environmental-justice-plan-is-popular

I will have a Secretary of Education who believes in public education, who believes in the value of every single one of our kids, and who will enforce our civil rights laws. #EqualityTownHall http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EGkGIXoXYAEHK1A.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1182473383323357185/vid/480x270/iKsGdggImCKDUZsU.mp4?tag=13

This year alone, 19 transgender people in the U.S. have been violently killed. That is a tragedy and an outrage.

When we are in the White House will make it clear that every murder of a transgender person will be investigated by the Department of Justice as a severe hate crime.

Everyone should get the mental health care they need and be treated with dignity and respect. I'll fight to end the stigma around mental health—and under #MedicareForAll, every person will have comprehensive mental health coverage. #WorldMentalHealthDay

It's not coincidental that the top health care CEOs made $1.1 billion last year while 4 in 10 cancer patients lose their life savings due to treatment.

Our system is designed to take money from sick people and put it in the pockets of rich executives.

We need Medicare for All.

Tickets available now at http://2020club.org. The Trump administration has sought to roll back protections for LGBTQ+ people around the world. In my administration, it will end. I'll protect LGBTQ+ asylum seekers and put the full muscle of the State Department behind protecting human rights for LGBTQ+ people globally.

We believe that equal means equal. I say it because I want Republicans to hear that. I want them to know that people vote based on LGBTQ+ issues. We’ll push Mitch McConnell right now—but my main goal is that he’s not the Majority Leader come January 2021. #EqualityTownHall
